characters: Driver of a yellow bus, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A yellow bus is initially on the right side of the road, and a black car appears from behind and overtakes the self-driving vehicle from the right side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while driving on the urban road. The vehicle keeps a safe distance from the yellow bus on the right side and the black car that overtakes from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A yellow bus, approximately 5 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right side: A black car, approximately 3 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
